name: Apollo Protocol
description: Apollo token is the fourth token from Ceres Ecosystem. The Apollo Protocol is the first lending and borrowing platform on the @sora_xor network and a vital part of the Ceres ecosystem. Apollo allows users to deposit and borrow assets on the SORA network. Depositors can provide liquidity and earn passive income through interest, while borrowers can leverage their assets without selling them and pay interest for this service.
